channel.title: Max Hit
channel.description: Ok I have seen a command called max hit on a server but i can't remember which source it was but you used max as a command and it showed wat ur max hit would be. I have searched this in the tutorial section and I was wondering How do i make this a command and wat is involved?

item.title: Max Hit
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.equals("maxhit")) { CalculateMaxHit(); sendMessage("Max hit: "+playerMaxHit+""); }

Read full topic

Thats the easy part. Make a command like ::max show the void of calculateMaxHit()

No spoon feeding

item.title: Max Hit
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

ok ill check it out thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 09:10:08 pm[/size][hr]Ok I have found this in my client.java file and it is how to determine a players max hit

public void CalculateMaxHit() {

    /* max hits fixed by anarchy*/
    double MaxHit = 0;
    int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
    int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength

    if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { // Accurate & Defensive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.8275862068965517241379310344828));
    } else if (FightType == 2) { // Aggresive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 3) { // Controlled
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.7586206896551724137931034482759));
    }
    if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0014);
    } else if (StrPotion == 2) { // Super Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0205);
    }
    if (StrPrayer == 1) { // Burst Of Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.005);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { // Super Human Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.01);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { // Ultimate Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.015);
    }               [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 09:11:23 pm[/size][hr]Where do i go from here?

Read full topic

item.title: Max Hit

Read through the method used to determine a player’s max hit and create the command based on that.
